content: if there s something strange in your neighbourhood i ain t afraid of no ghost show off your spooky season spirit with these cuff-down ectoplasm socks specifically designed for some super fun self-striping yarns the pattern pdf is a complete pattern and is charted but you can just use the ghost motif if you want and do the rest of the sock however you normally do socks standard gauge standard needles charts are read right-to-left test pattern yarn totals 59g of mc used approximately 5g each of cc1 and cc2
